tweets.text: At the same time, Joe, in recent weeks I've gotten multiple emails from @mcuban's @costplusdrugs that it's lowering prices or adding new drugs. (Disclosure: Customer. Sharply lower than anybody on 1 of my BP meds. Makes ZERO sense. Don't get me started...) https://t.co/C6YWUiIN7G
My latest - Southwest's Screwup Exposes a Myth of Margins... How Tesla Is Hurting ETFs... And My 2023 Prediction https://t.co/9BbcPSsdcg h/t @OnTheTapePod @mjmauboussin @Peter_Atwater

In my transition to long-biased writing, with a longer-term view on cos that fell thru the cracks during the bubble, I've become far more respectful of trying to tune out noise (I used to/still do create!) My latest on the topic – "When to Sell a Stock." https://t.co/V2FTjt9yRl

I knew Barry before he was Barry. Now, he calls Michael Bloomberg "Dude," or so he claims in this very enjoyable convo w/the ever-inquisitive @steveclapham. https://t.co/GZ2VSDKYpy

I'm starting to ponder Twitter alternatives JUST IN CASE. Every time I go to sign up for Mastadon I get a headache. (It's like a throwback to dialup days.) I saw @karaswisher  talk about https://t.co/kUI0TuTnpK, so got on that list. For investment news, I'm at @PrometheusAlts.
